review: played many hours on bnet, the base gameplay is okay, and the progression systems are a downgrade from ow1, but overall it's a 5/10 game that passes the time at least. Avoid the shop like the plague.

i paid 50euro for this when i was good now i have to pay 15euro to play the story this is the bigest cash grab ever paladins is free made by a indie company and they let me play the game without paying 20euro a game and you can get every guy for free

i have nearly a thousand hours in this game and i am so glad to say im proud of you all leaving negative reviews and i want to thank blizzard for putting this on steam, being the equivalent of lobotomising themselves with a pencil

If you wanna play hero shooter on steam, just go play paladins way more balanced, way more heroes, (champions) and much much more fan service. For example paladins newest champion in named Nyx and she is a dommy mommy so go play the game now. 

And also ow 2 is so bad they nerf heroes to the ground and then never do anything to fix them, for example hog. And also the new flashpoint gamemode is so shit its just snowball gamemode where who gets the first point will get the others too. etc etc this game has so many problems that i cant even remember all of them. Just dont touch this.
